src:
WATCH: Mariah Carey already has a Christmas ad out and it's a must-watch!

02 Nov 2019, 08:22

Cape Town - Pop star Mariah Carey has been revealed as the new face for Walkers' Christmas advert. The campaign coincides with the 25th anniversary of Carey's Christmas hit, All I Want For Christmas Is You.

WATCH IT HERE:
